known_issues: Image under the “Our Mission” heading is not loading for the user.

existing_features.title: Add resilient client-side error handling for the Mission section image element so that if the image fails to load, the UI shows a clear in-page fallback message (English) instead of a broken image.

new_feature_requests.summary: Ensure the Mission section image loads correctly under the “Our Mission” heading on the Home page by verifying the static asset exists at the exact path referenced by `MISSION_IMAGE_PATH` and is served by the frontend build.

projectName: Fix missing Mission image under “Our Mission” section
